   19: %%
   20: 
   21: -module(maybe_no_opt_SUITE).
   22: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   23: 
   24: %% Note: also require the feature to be set during runtime as long as
   25: %% the feature is experimental.  This is currently done in ../Makefile
   26: %% by overriding the test target.  Ugly and very non local.
   27: -feature(maybe_expr, enable).
   28: 
   29: -export([all/0, groups/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1]).
   30: -export([basic/1, nested/1]).
   31: 
   32: all() ->
   33:     [{group,p}].
   34: 
   35: groups() ->
   36:     [{p,[parallel],
   37:       [basic,nested]}].
   38: 
   39: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   40:     test_lib:recompile(?MODULE),
   41:     Config.
   42: 
   43: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   44:     ok.
   45: 
   46: -record(value, {v}).
   47: 
   48: basic(_Config) ->
   49:     {ok,42,fish} = basic_1(0, #{0 => {ok,42}, 42 => {ok,fish}}),
   50:     error = basic_1(0, #{0 => {ok,42}, 42 => {error,whatever}}),
   51:     error = basic_1(0, #{0 => {ok,42}, 42 => error}),
   52:     error = basic_1(0, #{0 => error}),
   53:     error = basic_1(0, #{0 => {error,whatever}}),
   54:     some_value = basic_1(0, #{0 => #value{v=some_value}}),
   55:     {'EXIT',{{else_clause,something_wrong},[_|_]}} = catch basic_1(0, #{0 => something_wrong}),
   56: 
   57:     {ok,life,"universe",everything} = basic_2(0, #{0 => {ok,life},
   58:                                                    life => "universe",
   59:                                                    "universe" => {ok,everything}}),
   60:     error = basic_2(0, #{0 => {ok,life},
   61:                          life => "universe",
   62:                          "universe" => error}),
   63:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,not_a_list},[_|_]}} = catch basic_2(0, #{0 => {ok,life},
   64:                                                                 life => not_a_list}),
   65:     {'EXIT',{{else_clause,not_ok},[_|_]}} = catch basic_2(0, #{0 => {ok,life},
   66:                                                                life => "universe",
   67:                                                                "universe" => not_ok}),
   68:     {'EXIT',{{else_clause,not_ok},[_|_]}} = catch basic_2(0, #{0 => not_ok}),
   69: 
   70:     {ok,42,fish,dolphins} = basic_3(0, #{0 => {ok,42}, 42 => {ok,fish},
   71:                                          fish => {ok,#value{v=dolphins}}}),
   72:     {error,whatever} = basic_3(0, #{0 => {ok,42}, 42 => {error,whatever}}),
   73:     failed = basic_3(0, #{0 => {ok,42}, 42 => failed}),
   74:     failed_early = basic_3(0, #{0 => failed_early}),
   75: 
   76:     y = maybe nomatch ?= id(x) else _ -> y end,
   77:     y = maybe nomatch ?= id(x) else _ -> x, y end,
   78: 
   79:     x = maybe nomatch ?= id(x) else E1 -> E1 end,
   80: 
   81:     6 = maybe X1 = 2+2, X1+2 end,
   82:     6 = maybe X2 = 2+2, X2+2 else {error, T} -> T end,
   83:     {"llo", "hello", "hello"} = maybe Y1 = "he"++X3=Z1 ?= "hello", {X3,Y1,Z1} end,
   84:     {"llo", "hello", "llo"} = maybe Y2 = "he"++(X4=Z2) ?= "hello", {X4,Y2,Z2} end,
   85: 
   86:     whatever = maybe
   87:                    AlwaysMatching ?= id(whatever),
   88:                    AlwaysMatching
   89:                else
   90:                    E2 -> E2
   91:                end,
   92: 
   93:     <<0>> = basic_4(id({<<0>>})),
   94: 
   95:     ok.
   96: 
   97: basic_1(V0, M) ->
   98:     Res = basic_1a(V0, M),
   99:     {wrapped,Res} = basic_1b(V0, M),
  100:     {wrapped,Res} = basic_1c(V0, M),
  101:     Res.
  102: 
  103: basic_1a(V0, M) ->
  104:     maybe
  105:         {ok,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  106:         {ok,V2} ?= do_something(V1, M),
  107:         {ok,V1,V2}
  108:     else
  109:         {error,_} ->
  110:             error;
  111:         error ->
  112:             error;
  113:         #value{v=V} ->
  114:             V
  115:     end.
  116: 
  117: basic_1b(V0, M) ->
  118:     Result =
  119:         maybe
  120:             {ok,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  121:             {ok,V2} ?= do_something(V1, M),
  122:             {ok,V1,V2}
  123:         else
  124:             {error,_} ->
  125:                 error;
  126:             error ->
  127:                 error;
  128:             #value{v=V} ->
  129:                 V
  130:         end,
  131:     {wrapped,Result}.
  132: 
  133: basic_1c(V0, M) ->
  134:     OK = id(ok),
  135:     Error = id(error),
  136:     Result =
  137:         maybe
  138:             {OK,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  139:             {OK,V2} ?= do_something(V1, M),
  140:             {OK,V1,V2}
  141:         else
  142:             {Error,_} ->
  143:                 Error;
  144:             Error ->
  145:                 Error;
  146:             #value{v=V} ->
  147:                 V
  148:         end,
  149:     {wrapped,Result}.
  150: 
  151: basic_2(V0, M) ->
  152:     Res = basic_2a(V0, M),
  153:     {wrapped,Res} = basic_2b(V0, M),
  154:     Res.
  155: 
  156: basic_2a(V0, M) ->
  157:     maybe
  158:         {ok,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  159:         V2 = [_|_] = do_something(V1, M),
  160:         {ok,V3} ?= do_something(V2, M),
  161:         {ok,V1,V2,V3}
  162:     else
  163:         {error,_} ->
  164:             error;
  165:         error ->
  166:             error;
  167:         #value{v=V} ->
  168:             V
  169:     end.
  170: 
  171: basic_2b(V0, M) ->
  172:     Result =
  173:         maybe
  174:             {ok,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  175:             V2 = [_|_] = do_something(V1, M),
  176:             {ok,V3} ?= do_something(V2, M),
  177:             {ok,V1,V2,V3}
  178:         else
  179:             {error,_} ->
  180:                 error;
  181:             error ->
  182:                 error;
  183:             #value{v=V} ->
  184:                 V
  185:         end,
  186:     _ = id(0),
  187:     {wrapped,Result}.
  188: 
  189: basic_3(V0, M) ->
  190:     Res = basic_3a(V0, M),
  191:     {wrapped,Res} = basic_3b(V0, M),
  192:     Res.
  193: 
  194: basic_3a(V0, M) ->
  195:     maybe
  196:         {ok,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  197:         {ok,V2} ?= do_something(V1, M),
  198:         {ok,#value{v=V3}} ?= do_something(V2, M),
  199:         {ok,V1,V2,V3}
  200:     end.
  201: 
  202: basic_3b(V0, M) ->
  203:     Result =
  204:         maybe
  205:             {ok,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  206:             {ok,V2} ?= do_something(V1, M),
  207:             {ok,#value{v=V3}} ?= do_something(V2, M),
  208:             {ok,V1,V2,V3}
  209:         end,
  210:     {wrapped,Result}.
  211: 
  212: basic_4({X}) ->
  213:     maybe 
  214:         <<_:(ok)>> ?= X
  215:     end.
  216: 
  217: nested(_Config) ->
  218:     {outer_fail,not_ok} = nested_1(0, #{0 => not_ok}),
  219:     {x,{error,inner}} = nested_1(0, #{0 => {ok,x}, x => {error,inner}}),
  220:     {outer_fail,{unexpected,not_error}} = nested_1(0, #{0 => {ok,x}, x => not_error}),
  221:     ok.
  222: 
  223: nested_1(V0, M) ->
  224:     Res = nested_1a(V0, M),
  225:     {wrapped,Res} = nested_1b(V0, M),
  226:     {wrapped,Res} = nested_1c(V0, M),
  227:     Res.
  228: 
  229: nested_1a(V0, M) ->
  230:     maybe
  231:         {ok,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  232:         V2 = {error,_} ?=
  233:             maybe
  234:                 {error, _} ?= id(do_something(V1, M))
  235:             else
  236:                 Unexpected -> {unexpected, Unexpected}
  237:             end,
  238:         {V1,V2}
  239:     else
  240:         Res -> {outer_fail,Res}
  241:     end.
  242: 
  243: nested_1b(V0, M) ->
  244:     Result =
  245:         maybe
  246:             {ok,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  247:             V2 = {error,_} ?=
  248:                 maybe
  249:                     {error, _} ?= id(do_something(V1, M))
  250:                 else
  251:                     Unexpected -> {unexpected, Unexpected}
  252:                 end,
  253:             {V1,V2}
  254:         else
  255:             Res -> {outer_fail,Res}
  256:         end,
  257:     {wrapped,Result}.
  258: 
  259: nested_1c(V0, M) ->
  260:     Result =
  261:         maybe
  262:             R ?= maybe
  263:                      {ok,V1} ?= do_something(V0, M),
  264:                      {error,_} = V2 ?=
  265:                          maybe
  266:                              {error, _} ?= id(do_something(V1, M))
  267:                          else
  268:                              Unexpected -> {unexpected, Unexpected}
  269:                          end,
  270:                      {V1,V2}
  271:                  else
  272:                      Res -> {outer_fail,Res}
  273:                  end,
  274:             R
  275:         else
  276:             Var -> Var
  277:         end,
  278:     {wrapped,Result}.
  279: 
  280: %% Utility functions.
  281: 
  282: do_something(V, M) ->
  283:     map_get(id(V), M).
  284: 
  285: id(X) -> X.
